description:
NTS Map: 092G06
A very wide, easy (flat) trail with good views over eagle harbour in West Vancouver. A great spot to take kids learning to ride a bike.
directions: Exit HWY 1 at Eagleridge dr. and continue downhill. Park at the intersection of Eagleridge drive and Marine Drive in west Van. The trail is immediately uphill from the small parking lot.
title: Seaview Trail
